content: thank you for being interested in this pattern it s the first pattern i ve ever shared this resting fox blanket was inspired and created for my nephew who i was determined to be associated with a fox excitedly enough his little cries sound exactly like a kit this blanket uses graphgan or tapestry techniques it is not a beginner s pattern but if you ve done any colorwork it should not be too difficult i have worked to include as much detail as possible providing both the written and image instructions there are several color changes in this pattern so to prevent any hair pulling at the end weave in as you go finished size approximately 40 x 36 baby blanket size terminology us terms materials required your favorite worsted weight yarn i used loops & threads soft classic 5 0 mm h crochet hook tapestry needle to sew ends scissors stitches used in this pattern slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet
